title: Filename forensics suggest there has always been a PC version of Bloodborne—but that doesn't mean we can ever play it
description: Longtime Souls series dataminer Lance McDonald has discussed this build before, but also noticed fresh evidence on the Bloodborne Wiki.

title: The Dead Cells board game is off to a promising crowdfunding start
description: Good designers, good company, maybe even a good game.

title: I could barely keep it together in this free game where you're the president trying to hide that he's an alien

description: The first major milestone for any budding fighting game player.

title: Mass Effect: Andromeda's creative director still wishes it had got a sequel
description: Mac Walters says Andromeda was developed during "a weird phase in the industry where a lot of people were saying quantity was quality".

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #701: Sunday, May 21
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Peter Molyneux's Magic Carpet was a game of violent chess, and a true one-off
description: In this classic feature, Ed Ricketts beats the dust off Magic Carpet and takes it for a spin.

title: Despite being dead for 20 years, Warhammer Online is hosting a live event on a private server
description: For a dead MMO, Warhammer Online shows plenty of signs of life.
